```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
# function to add gene names to data table
# assumes first column of table is G gene
# uses master list with gene name in 1st column, G gene in 3rd column
addGeneNamesTable<- function(data,geneID, gene, desc){ # a little redundant to send in geneID but this solves the problem that different objects name it differently
  data$GeneName <- '' # create empty column 
  for (i in 1:nrow(data)){
    #ggene = data$gene[[i]] #cluster markers
    ggene = geneID[[i]] # individual cluster markers
    #ggene = data$Feature[[i]] #dimheatmap
    #ggene = data$feature[[i]] #viz dim loadings
    loc <- which(gene ==ggene)
    if (length(loc)>0) {  # if something is found
      data$GeneName[[i]] <- desc[loc[1]] # if multiple found, use 1st one
    }
  }
  
  data
}
```


```{r, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
replaceLabelsX <- function(p,gene,desc){
  pp<- ggplot_build(p)
  oldxlabels = ggplot_build(p)$layout$panel_params[[1]]$x$breaks
  newxlabels = oldxlabels
  for (i in 1:length(oldxlabels)){
    loc<-which(gene==(oldxlabels[[i]]))
    if (length(loc)>0){
      newxlabels[[i]] = paste(oldxlabels[[i]], "-", desc[[loc[1]]])
      newxlabels[[i]] = substr(newxlabels[[i]],1,50)}
    else {
      for (j in 1:length(newxlabels)){
        inds<-which(noID$ggene==(newxlabels[[j]]))
        if (length(inds)>0){
          newxlabels[[j]] = paste(newxlabels[[j]], "-", noID$Manual_NCBI_BLAST_ID[[inds[1]]])
        }
        newxlabels[[j]] = substr(newxlabels[[j]],1,50)
      }}}
  p<- p + scale_x_discrete(labels = newxlabels)
}
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
replaceLabelsY <- function(p,gene,desc){
  pp<- ggplot_build(p)
  oldylabels = ggplot_build(p)$layout$panel_params[[1]]$y$breaks
  newylabels = oldylabels
  for (i in 1:length(oldylabels)){
    loc<-which(gene==(oldylabels[[i]])) # i/ind 4 = 919, G34789, NPcorrendocrine protein/ label = paste(genelabels[919], "-", namelist[919]) 
    if (length(loc)> 0) {
      #loc<-which(oldylabels %in% genelabels)
      newylabels[[i]] = paste(oldylabels[[i]], "-", desc[[loc[1]]])
      newylabels[[i]] = substr(newylabels[[i]],1,50)}
    else {
      for (j in 1:length(newylabels)){
        inds<-which(noID$ggene==(newylabels[[j]]))
        if (length(inds)>0){
          newylabels[[j]] = paste(newylabels[[j]], "-", noID$Manual_NCBI_BLAST_ID[[inds[1]]])
        }
        newylabels[[j]] = substr(newylabels[[j]],1,50)
      }}}
  p<- p + scale_y_discrete(labels = newylabels)
}
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
# function to add gene names to data table
# assumes first column of table is G gene
# uses master list with gene name in 1st column, G gene in 3rd column
addGeneNamesTable<- function(data,gene_master){
  data$GeneName <- '' # create empty column 
  for (i in 1:nrow(data)){
    ggene = data$gene[[i]]
    loc <- which(gene_master[[3]] ==ggene)
    if (length(loc)>0) {  # if something is found
      data$GeneName[[i]] <- gene_master[[loc[1],1]] # if multiple found, use 1st one
    }
  }
  
  data
}
```

```{r fig.width=8, fig.height=10}
# looping through significant PCs based on jackstraw

all2 <- readRDS("/Users/josongco/Desktop/ABD/FinalSeqData/hifiAsm5Cells-MitoAnnot_minFeat500__mito6_nCount1000-20000_nFeatmin600_082321_SctCCA_omitdims.rds")

sigpc = c(1:12, 15, 16, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 24) #significant pcs, 25 not significant
loops = seq(9, 29, 2)

all2 <- RunPCA(all2, verbose = FALSE)

pdf(file = "/Users/josongco/Desktop/ABD/FinalSeqData/hifiasm5cells_092121names/umaploops_sigpc_clustermarkers_14x11.pdf",
    width = 14, # The width of the plot in inches
    height = 11)

for (Loop in 2:length(sigpc)){
  
  DefaultAssay(all2) <- 'integrated'
  
  pcLoop <- RunUMAP(all2, dims = 1:sigpc[Loop], verbose = FALSE)
  pcLoop <- FindNeighbors(pcLoop , dims = 1:sigpc[Loop], verbose = FALSE)
  pcLoop <- FindClusters(pcLoop , verbose = FALSE)
  pcLoop.tree <- BuildClusterTree(pcLoop , reorder = TRUE, reorder.numeric = TRUE, slot = "scale.data", verbose = TRUE, dims = 1:sigpc[Loop])
  p<- DimPlot(pcLoop.tree, reduction = "umap", label = TRUE) + ggtitle(paste(sigpc[Loop], 'sig pcs', sep=" "))
  print(p)
  PlotClusterTree(pcLoop.tree, label = TRUE) 
  
  DefaultAssay(pcLoop.tree) <- 'SCT'
  
  genelist <- genesofint$ggene
  genelist <- addGeneNamesTable(genesofint,genesofint$ggene,gene_master$ggene, gene_master$merge_desc)

  CL<-DotPlot(pcLoop.tree,features=rev(genelist$ggene)) + RotatedAxis()+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 6)) + NoLegend() 
  CL <- replaceLabelsX(CL,gene_master$ggene,gene_master$merge_desc)
  CL <- CL+ ggtitle('clustermarkers') # change each time
  print(CL)}
  
  dev.off() 
  

```

```{r}
resolution <- seq(0.1,1,0.1)

pdf(file = "/Users/josongco/Desktop/resolution_umaptreeclustermarkers.pdf", #change each time
    width = 14, # The width of the plot in inches
    height = 11)

for (Res in 1:length(resolution)){
all <- RunUMAP(all, dims = DM, verbose = FALSE)
all <- FindNeighbors(all, dims = DM, verbose = FALSE)
all_res <- FindClusters(all, verbose = FALSE, resolution = resolution[Res]) # resolution = 0.4

all_res.tree <- BuildClusterTree(all_res, reorder = TRUE, reorder.numeric = TRUE, slot = "scale.data", verbose = TRUE, dims = DM)

dim <- DimPlot(all_res.tree, reduction = "umap", label = TRUE) 
dim <- dim + ggtitle(paste('umap for 25pcs, resolution', resolution[Res]))
print(dim)

PlotClusterTree(all_res.tree, label = TRUE)

DefaultAssay(all_res.tree) <- "SCT"

cl<-DotPlot(all_res.tree,features=rev(genelist$ggene)) + RotatedAxis()+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 6)) + NoLegend() 
cl <- replaceLabelsX(cl,gene_master$ggene,gene_master$merge_desc)
cl <- cl+ ggtitle(paste('clustermarkers for 25pcs, resolution', resolution[Res])) # change each time
print(cl)
}

dev.off()
```
